thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: REFILE-BRIEF-HNA Innovation's Board Elects Directors, To Hold Shareholder Meeting On Mar 9

author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-HNA Innovation's Board Elects Directors, To Hold Shareholder Meeting On Mar 9
text:
(Refiles with extra link)
Feb 12 (Reuters) - HNA Innovation Co Ltd :
* SAYS BOARD ELECTS ZHU JIE, BAO RULIN AS BOARD DIRECTORS, REPLACING LI TIE, LI QIANG
* SAYS IT WILL HOLD SHAREHOLDER MEETING ON MARCH 9 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2CfcaMq ; bit.ly/2BVrgv7 Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
